LanguageData.VME_Raiding_Honorable.label: honorable
LanguageData.VME_Raiding_Honorable.description: We display our strength and perseverance through conquest, and in doing so we bring honor to our colony.
LanguageData.VME_Raiding_Abhorrent.label: odrażające
LanguageData.VME_Raiding_Abhorrent.description: We worked hard for what we have, we cannot take from the weak as we too were once weak. Doing so is a tremendous shame.
